txt.en: 'Oh, bless me! I didn't hear you sneak up on me there!'
'What kind of a madman rides though a fence? I hope his poor horse is all right.'
'What a merry mess we have here. All those animals wandering Buckland, just as free as you please.'
'That grumpy man with the hay-fork over there has been complaining about the sheep since he arrived.'
